about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Full Stack Developer
about.description: I'm a full stack web developer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable, efficient, and user-friendly web applications. My expertise spans across front-end and back-end technologies, with a strong focus on modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud technologies.

position1.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
position1.responsibility1: Lead development of scalable web applications using React and Node.js
position1.responsibility2: Implemented CI/CD pipelines, improving deployment efficiency by 40%
position1.responsibility3: Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

position2.title: Full Stack Developer
position2.responsibility1: Developed and maintained multiple client websites using Vue.js and Django
position2.responsibility2: Optimized database queries, resulting in a 30% improvement in application performance
position2.responsibility3: Collaborated with UX designers to implement responsive and accessible interfaces

position3.title: Junior Web Developer
position3.responsibility1: Assisted in the development of a social media management tool using React and Express
position3.responsibility2: Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services
position3.responsibility3: Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning meetings

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's connect!
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following channels:
